posts.header: We have recently gone through a time change here in the states which may affect starting times for you!
Brett's first ever sponsored TTRPG Campaign - Lords of the Fallen - will premiere October 27th at 8pm EST - starring TheCrownedDM, Joefudge, SciFri and SummersSalt!!.
Curious Curios will be returning for sessions on Nov 21st, Nov 28th, and Dec 5th. After the three sessions they will be on break for the rest of the year.

Pipe Dreamers is now on Indefinite Hiatus.

 There will be no wrap up session, no fanart session, and pcs from Pipe Dreamers will not appear in future cameos.
